name: Martin-Luther-Universität Halle-Wittenberg
goal: Martin Luther University Halle-Wittenberg – for more than 500 years a place of scientific enlightenment, academic development and future-oriented research – is the largest university in the state of Saxony-Anhalt. Above all, however, it is an efficient, modern full-university, which maintains the highest requirements for teaching and research.
euInitiatives: research and innovation related policies, EU framework programme for research and innovation and for education
